vue-gridjs/autoWidth.description: Boolean to automatically set table width. Default: true

vue-gridjs/from.description: String of HTML table selector. Default: undefined

vue-gridjs/data.description: Object containing arrays of columns [cols] & rows [rows]. Default: { cols: [''], rows: [''] }

vue-gridjs/pagination.description: Boolean or pagination settings object. Default: true

vue-gridjs/search.description: Boolean or search settings object. Default: false

vue-gridjs/sort.description: Boolean or sort settings object. Default: false

vue-gridjs/theme.description: String with name of theme. Default: 'mermaid'

vue-gridjs/width.description: String with CSS width value. Default: undefined
